items.title: Application Launched
items.description: The application is now live on a public domain for initial testing and feedback.

items.title: PLG CMMS Credentials
items.description: All credentials have been sent today

items.title: Requirements and fixings collection
items.description: CMMS Development team will stay receiving your usage feedback until 15/08/2025.

items.title: Fixings and Improving phase
items.description: Depending on the type of new requirements gathered during the testing phase, the dev team will set a deadline for the new upgrade and fixings and will share with all stakeholders.

items.title: PLG FUSECON Tablet's count
items.description: How many tablets do we have for CMMS usage?

items.title: APK (Android app) will be delivered on demand
items.description: Depending on the available Tables for CMMS usage we will be sending the corresponding APK for app installations.
